citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at approximately
12:30 pm on 02/06/2014.
The inspector contacted the facility owner by phone after arriving at the facility. The facility owner indicated that he
was gone and would not be returning for several hours.
A responsible adult shall be available to conduct an inspection.
